import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Nav, NavMenuLeft, ResponsiveNavButton, NavMenuRight, NavLinkButton, } from "../../styled-components/NavbarStyles"; import CompanyLogo from "../../assets/company-logo.png"; function Header() { const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { let userInLocalStorage = localStorage.getItem("id_token"); if (userInLocalStorage === null) { alert("You have to login first to access this page"); navigate("/login"); console.log(userInLocalStorage, "23244"); return; } }, []); const logout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("id_token"); navigate("/login"); }; return (
